item.title: Data Centres Can Cut Energy Use By Up To 30% With Just About 30 Lines of Code, Research Shows
item.description:
New research has found that data centres can reduce their energy usage by up to 30% simply by altering around 30 lines of code in the Linux kernelâ€™s network stack.
